item.title: Alerting System (Audio/Visual) Flight Deck Call System

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures for contacting flight deck are established and used.

numlitem.para: The Captain or designee will verbally advise the occupants of the Upper Deck Compartments of normal and emergency procedures when the Flight Deck Call System is inoperative.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel "FLT DK CALL ALERT SYS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
